attributes.action: We are petitioning parliament to debate at PMQs whether the condemnation of homosexuality found in many religious texts may cause homophobic prejudice
attributes.additional_details:
I have proposed this petition as I feel very strongly that the condemnation of homosexuality found in many religious texts is unjust and I would like parliament to debate this very contentious issue. I have authored a website
www.beinggayisnotasin.org
I will put the site online once I have had a response from your end, as I will need to link my site to the petition if you approve my proposal.

rejection.details: E-petitions cannot be used to suggest anything at PMQs which are decided by individual MPs.  Perhaps lobby your MP to ask the question?
